description:
Would you like to be more organized with your life? The secret to achieving more, is to take more effective action.

The secret to taking more effective action is to take the time to make a simple plan.

Knowing where to start is often the biggest obstacle to creating a great plan which is why I created this course.

You probably know what you want to see at the end of a project or what achieving a goal looks like but you may be at a loss how to create the map to get you there.

In this course you will get several road maps that you can use to accomplish a wide range of projects - everything from writing a book to planning your weekly grocery shopping.

You will get detailed lectures about how to approach creating each "map" and how to customize the map to suit you.

Plus you will gain insight and be inspired by some topics that you never thought to create a plan for.

We will be using Trello in this course and you will find that you can plan just about anything with this free online tool.

There are over 10 million people using Trello right now so you are among good company.

As a big Trello fan myself, I created this course to get your creative juices flowing by inspiring you to find all new ways of planning with Trello. I will demonstrate 15 different Trello boards each showing you a unique way to use the tool.

As a student, you will get access to each one of these sample boards so you can use them for your own projects!!

Here are just some of the boards included:

  • Writing a Book
  • Wedding Planning
  • Vacation Planning
  • Weekly Shopping
  • Personal Planner
  • Family Chore Chart
  • and many more!

Plus as an added bonus, I kick off the course with simple planning strategies you can use starting with your first board to increase your success in completing each Trello project. With my tips you will become on of the 3% who succeed with their goals instead of the 97% who just drift along.

Come join me in Trello Level 2 and get your hands of templates, board ideas and starter boards. You will find you can use Trello for just about anything.

Just click the Take This Course button and I will see you inside.

As always, you get Udemy's unconditional 30-day money back guarantee. If you are not inspired to use Trello to make your life more organized, you can get a full refund.
title: Trello Level 2 - A More Organized Life Awaits You
